channel.title: How do i add membership? so that ppl have to be member for some things?
channel.description: okay, i want membership in my source but i dono how to do itt... soooo any help is greaty appreciateedd tyyy

item.title: How do i add membership? so that ppl have to be member for some things?
item.dc:creator: @Invalid_Pwns Invalid_Pwns
item.description:
@Invalid_Pwns wrote:

You’d have to edit the rights so that mods 2 and member is one and on. Then you’d have to add portals so <1 can access and >1 Cant. Gl. I would just start with Czar if you want a base membership system.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i add membership? so that ppl have to be member for some things?
